entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI name is already in use #9364
  • Hot Reload Problem : Read out of bounds #9363
  • Catalyst currently doesn't get any beautiful context menus #9362
    Backlog
  • Assertion failure in -[UIApplication _createStatusBarWithRequestedStyle:orientation:hidden:], UIApplication.m:5461 #9360
  • Adding and Removing ContextMenus currently does not work #9359
    .NET 7
  • Default Right Click context menu on Entry currently crashes for the Maui.Control.Samples project #9353
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] ScrollView scroll bar is misplaced after window resize #9349
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Visual Studio 2022 not available in this system ? #9344
  • Android Options -> Additional supported encodings - CJK #9343
  • cannot publish Maui App with Visual Studio Publish as there is no "Client Secret" now #9340

Closed

  • Preferences API not working correctly on Windows #9338
    6.0-sr5
  • Add `maui-blazor-empty` Project Template #8616
    Backlog
  • The AOT compiler '' does not exist error when building for iOS #9354
  • Default value of a Preferences.Get returns a null value in Windows #9306
    Backlog
  • Maui application toolbar missing #9335
  • Failed processing manifest in migrated maui app #9120
  • GraphicsView and Path are using different coordinate systems #9356
    Backlog
  • MAUI DisplayAlert() When User Closes Window : Getting Unhandled Exception #9355
  • MAUI on .NET 7 RC1 not buildable in Visual Studio?! #9321
  • Unnecessary Margin in TitleView #9333
    Backlog
  • Button with rectangle above get Clicked event #9341
  • [MacCatalyst] Content in ScrollView does not resize when the Window resize. #8370
    Backlog
  • Blazor Desktop tenets: Performance #2531
    7.0-rc1
  • the default template of Maui Blazor app underline shows broken in my Android device #9334
  • Re-enable foldable in the sample #5894
    7.0-rc1
  • SVG is not displaying #8887
  • Crash CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9060
    6.0-sr5
  • PublishSingleFile=true causes maui app to crash at launch #9301
  • Button IsEnabled="{Binding IsBttEnabled}" - Not working - but IsVisible works #9331
  • Fail to build default Maui application #9337
  • MAUI is the bug #9336
  • Unable to deploy maui apps to android devices #9329

PullRequests

Created

  • Create AssemblyInfo.cs for .NET MAUI Project Template #9358
    community ✨
  • [windows] Release builds use `$(PublishReadyToRun)` by default #9357
  • [Blazor] Account for Maui multi-rid builds #9348
  • Convert more Android controls to AppCompat counterparts #9342
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr5

Merged

  • Pass the correct parameter value to the method #9361
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, i/regression, 6.0-sr5
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9318
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix incorrect MSBuild property name for catalyst #9350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 #9316
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 7.0-rc1
  • [NET7.0][Tizen] Bump up SamsungTizenSdkPackageVersion #9280
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.2.0 to 17.3.0 #9307
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.8 to 120.0.0.9 #9308
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9315
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9310
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 17.2.32505.113 to 17.3.32804.24 #9309
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1264.42 to 1.0.1293.44 #9284
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.0.2.1 to 118.0.2.2 #9312
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix [Android] CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9215
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9311
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9313
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9314
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9319
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
